lead_paragraph: Chelsea striker Diego Costa must serve an extra one-match ban after being sent off in last month's FA Cup tie at Everton, the Football Association said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Costa Handed Extra One-Match Ban
headline.main: Chelsea's Costa Handed Extra One-Match Ban

snippet: Chelsea striker Diego Costa must serve an extra one-match ban after being sent off in last month's FA Cup tie at Everton, the Football Association said on Friday....
